interface.name: CertPathValidatorResult
interface.javadoc:
A specification of the result of a certification path validator algorithm.

The purpose of this interface is to group (and provide type safety for) all certification path validator results. All results returned by the {@link CertPathValidator#validate CertPathValidator.validate}method must implement this interface. CertPathValidator 1.4 Yassir Elley
Makes a copy of this CertPathValidatorResult. Changes to the copy will not affect the original and vice versa. a copy of this CertPathValidatorResult
